00041 struct RsiSetTraits {
00042   bool operator()(const RangeStateInfo *x, const RangeStateInfo *y) const {
00043     if (x->table.id < y->table.id)
00044       return true;
00045 
00046     if (x->table.id > y->table.id)
00047       return false;
00048 
00049     return std::strcmp(x->range.end_row, y->range.end_row) < 0;
00050   }
00051 };
00052 
00053 typedef std::set<RangeStateInfo *, RsiSetTraits> RsiSet;
00054 typedef std::pair<RsiSet::iterator, bool> RsiInsRes;
00055 typedef RangeServerMetaLogReader Reader;
00056 
00057 void load_entry(Reader &rd, RsiSet &rsi_set, RangeLoaded *ep) {
00058   RangeStateInfo *rsi = new RangeStateInfo(ep->table, ep->range,
00059       ep->range_state, ep->timestamp);
00060   RsiInsRes res = rsi_set.insert(rsi);
00061 
00062   if (!res.second) {
00063     HT_WARN_OUT <<"Duplicate RangeLoaded entry in: "<< rd.path()
00064                 << " at "<< rd.pos() <<"/"<< rd.size() <<'\n'
00065                 << ep->table << ep->range << HT_END;
00066     delete rsi;
00067   }
00068 }
00069 
00070 void load_entry(Reader &rd, RsiSet &rsi_set, SplitStart *ep) {
00071   RangeStateInfo ri(ep->table, ep->range);
00072   RsiSet::iterator it = rsi_set.find(&ri);
00073 
00074   if (it == rsi_set.end())
00075     HT_THROWF(METALOG_ENTRY_BAD_ORDER, "Unexpected split start entry at "
00076         "%lu/%lu in %s", (Lu)rd.pos(), (Lu)rd.size(), rd.path().c_str());
00077 
00078   (*it)->transactions.push_back(ep);
00079   (*it)->range_state = ep->range_state;
00080 }
00081 
00082 void load_entry(Reader &rd, RsiSet &rsi_set, SplitDone *ep) {
00083   RangeStateInfo ri(ep->table, ep->range);
00084   RsiSet::iterator it = rsi_set.find(&ri);
00085 
00086   if (it == rsi_set.end() ||
00087       (*it)->transactions.empty() ||
00088       (*it)->transactions.front()->get_type() != RS_SPLIT_START)
00089     HT_THROWF(METALOG_ENTRY_BAD_ORDER, "Unexpected split done entry at "
00090         "%lu/%lu in %s", (Lu)rd.pos(), (Lu)rd.size(), rd.path().c_str());
00091 
00092   (*it)->transactions.clear();
00093   (*it)->range_state.clear();
00094 }
00095 
00096 void load_entry(Reader &rd, RsiSet &rsi_set, SplitShrunk *ep) {
00097   RangeStateInfo ri(ep->table, ep->range);
00098   RsiSet::iterator it = rsi_set.find(&ri);
00099 
00100   if (it == rsi_set.end() ||
00101       (*it)->transactions.empty() ||
00102       (*it)->transactions.front()->get_type() != RS_SPLIT_START)
00103     HT_THROWF(METALOG_ENTRY_BAD_ORDER, "Unexpected split shrunk entry at "
00104         "%lu/%lu in %s", (Lu)rd.pos(), (Lu)rd.size(), rd.path().c_str());
00105 
00106   (*it)->transactions.push_back(ep);
00107   // update shrunk range
00108   (*it)->range = ep->range;
00109   (*it)->range_state = ep->range_state;
00110 }

00123 
00124 void load_entry(Reader &rd, RsiSet &rsi_set, DropTable *ep) {
00125   RsiSet::iterator it = rsi_set.begin();
00126   RsiSet::iterator tmpit;
00127   
00128   while (it != rsi_set.end()) {
00129     if ((*it)->table.id == ep->table.id) {
00130       tmpit = it;
00131       ++it;
00132       rsi_set.erase(tmpit);
00133     }
00134     else
00135       ++it;
00136   }
00137 }

00142 namespace Hypertable {

00144 RangeServerMetaLogReader::RangeServerMetaLogReader(Filesystem *fs,
00145                                                    const String &path)
00146     : Parent(fs, path) {
00147   uint8_t buf[RSML_HEADER_SIZE];
00148   size_t len = RSML_HEADER_SIZE;
00149   size_t nread = fs->read(fd(), buf, RSML_HEADER_SIZE);
00150 
00151   if (nread != RSML_HEADER_SIZE)
00152     HT_THROW(METALOG_BAD_RS_HEADER, "");
00153 
00154   const uint8_t *p = buf + strlen(RSML_PREFIX);
00155 
00156   if (decode_i16(&p, &len) != RSML_VERSION)
00157     HT_THROW(METALOG_VERSION_MISMATCH, "");
00158 
00159   pos() += nread;
00160 }
00161 
00162 RangeServerMetaLogReader::~RangeServerMetaLogReader() {
00163   foreach(RangeStateInfo *i, m_range_states) delete i;
00164 }
00165 
00166 MetaLogEntry *
00167 RangeServerMetaLogReader::read() {
00168   ScanEntry entry;
00169 
00170   if (!next(entry))
00171     return 0;
00172 
00173   StaticBuffer buf(entry.buf);
00174   return new_from_payload(RangeServerMetaLogEntryType(entry.type),
00175                           entry.timestamp, buf);
00176 }
00177 
00178 const RangeStates &
00179 RangeServerMetaLogReader::load_range_states(bool force) {
00180   if (!force && m_range_states.size())
00181     return m_range_states;      // already loaded
00182 
00183   if (pos() > RSML_HEADER_SIZE) {
00184     // need to start from scratch, as seek doesn't work on buffered reads yet
00185     RangeServerMetaLogReaderPtr p(new RangeServerMetaLogReader(&fs(), path()));
00186     p->load_range_states();
00187     p->m_range_states.swap(m_range_states);
00188     return m_range_states;
00189   }
00190   RsiSet rsi_set;
00191 
00192   for (MetaLogEntry *p = read(); p; p = read()) {
00193     switch (p->get_type()) {
00194     case RS_RANGE_LOADED:
00195       load_entry(*this, rsi_set, (RangeLoaded *)p);     break;
00196     case RS_SPLIT_START:
00197       load_entry(*this, rsi_set, (SplitStart *)p);      break;
00198     case RS_SPLIT_DONE:
00199       load_entry(*this, rsi_set, (SplitDone *)p);       break;
00200     case RS_SPLIT_SHRUNK:
00201       load_entry(*this, rsi_set, (SplitShrunk *)p);     break;
00202     case RS_MOVE_START:
00203       load_entry(*this, rsi_set, (MoveStart *)p);       break;
00204     case RS_MOVE_PREPARED:
00205       load_entry(*this, rsi_set, (MovePrepared *)p);    break;
00206     case RS_MOVE_DONE:
00207       load_entry(*this, rsi_set, (MoveDone *)p);        break;
00208     case RS_DROP_TABLE:
00209       load_entry(*this, rsi_set, (DropTable *)p);        break;
00210     default:
00211       HT_FATALF("Bad code: unhandled entry type: %d", p->get_type());
00212     }
00213   }
00214   std::copy(rsi_set.begin(), rsi_set.end(), back_inserter(m_range_states));
00215   return m_range_states;
00216 }

00218 std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &out, const RangeStateInfo &info) {
00219   out <<"{RangeStateInfo: table="<< info.table <<"\n  range="<< info.range;
00220 
00221   if (info.transactions.size()) {
00222     out <<"\n  transactions=(\n";
00223 
00224     foreach(const MetaLogEntryPtr &ptr, info.transactions) 
00225       out <<"    "<< ptr.get() <<'\n';
00226 
00227     out <<"  )";
00228   }
00229   out <<"\n}\n";
00230   return out;
00231 }
